name: Peepy Commits A Crime Demo
description: Peepy Commits a Crime is an action/adventure game where you play as Peepy. You must commit crimes to win. Sadly, this is just a short demo designed to show you the basic idea of Peepy Commits A Crime. The real one will be released some time this Summer. In the meantime, don't be like peepy, stay safe, get vaccinated, and wear a mask. See you soon!
